subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand and products, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: What products do you supply under the Salloura brand?
faqs.answer: We supply a wide range of Salloura food products, including extra virgin olive oil, zaatar, tahini, sumac, sesame seeds, and other pantry essentials known for their premium quality and authentic Middle Eastern flavors.

faqs.question: What is the ASALA brand, and what products does it include?
faqs.answer: ASALA is a trusted brand weâ€™ve added to our product family, offering a variety of high-quality food products such as spices, olive oils, zaatar blends, and traditional condiments that complement our Salloura range.

faqs.question: Are you the sole supplier of Salloura products in Europe?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are proud to be the exclusive supplier of Salloura food products across Europe, ensuring that you receive authentic, high-quality goods directly from the source.

faqs.question: Where can I buy your products?
faqs.answer: You can purchase our products directly through our website. We offer convenient delivery across Europe to ensure you enjoy Salloura and ASALA products wherever you are.

faqs.question: Do you ship to all European countries?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide shipping to all European countries. Delivery times may vary depending on your location. Please refer to our shipping policy for details.

faqs.question: What makes Salloura and ASALA products unique?
faqs.answer: Both Salloura and ASALA products are crafted with authentic Middle Eastern recipes and the finest ingredients, ensuring unmatched quality, taste, and freshness in every item.

faqs.question: How do I store your products to maintain their quality?
faqs.answer: Most of our products, such as olive oil, zaatar, and spices, should be stored in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Always check individual packaging for specific storage instructions.

faqs.question: Can I purchase your products in bulk?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer bulk purchasing options for businesses, restaurants, and retailers. Please contact us directly for bulk order inquiries and pricing.
